## User story

As a [type of user], I want [goal], so that [reason].

## Acceptance criteria

- Given ... when ... then ...

## Story points

Estimate: _points_

## Sprint

Planned Sprint: _Sprint 1_

## Notes

Add any design notes, screenshots, or links to docs.
